original_text: We have become united with Christ, and we have died like he died. Because of that, we will also be united with him in his new life. Just like Christ rose, we also will rise to a new life.
korean_text: 만일 우리가 그의 죽으심과 같은 모양으로 연합한 자가 되었으면 또한 그의 부활과 같은 모양으로 연합한 자도 되리라

sentences.original_text: We have become united with Christ
and we have died like he died
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 그가 죽으신 것처럼 죽었습니다

sentences.original_text: we will also be united with him
we also will rise to a new life
